title: Gamification-Based Motivation Strategies for Underachieving Students

context.prior_knowledge: Language proficiency at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Targets improved engagement and achievement of underperforming students in corporate language education programs

learning_goals: Learners voluntarily participate in over 80% of gamified assignments, improving their learning attitudes.
Learners strengthen learning persistence by achieving a weekly mission completion rate of over 70%.
Learners promote social interaction by earning an average of 4+ points (on a 5-point scale) in peer evaluations and feedback activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
